thread.title: Angelina Jolie urges NATO to tackle sexual violence in war

title: Angelina Jolie urges NATO to tackle sexual violence in war
text:
Angelina Jolie urges NATO to tackle sexual violence in war 5:17pm GMT - 01:25 
U.N. refugee agency special envoy Angelina Jolie appears at a press conference to call on NATO to help stop the use of sexual violence as a weapon of war. Rough cut (no reporter narration).   
U.N. refugee agency special envoy Angelina Jolie appears at a press conference to call on NATO to help stop the use of sexual violence as a weapon of war. Rough cut (no reporter narration).  //reut.rs/2nuVefC
